SEARCH
Package model

Class GameModel

java.lang.Object
model.GameModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameModel extends Object implements Serializable
This is the GameModel class of MVC model. This class has a references of Models. This class acts as an Data info for other controllers.

    • startUpPhase

      public void startUpPhase() throws Exception

      This Method is the startup Phase method

      • This Method will take all the players in a queue
      • Then it will check for all the countries available in a map
      • It will run the loop until all the countries are assigned to players
      • Now it will Randomly assign countries to all players and remove the assigned countries from the list
      Throws:
      Exception - if there are no players in the list

    • assignReinforcementArmies

      public void assignReinforcementArmies() throws Exception

      This Method will assign armies to the players.

      • This Method will check if they players size is greater than 0
      • If it is greater than 0 it will check for no of countries assigned for player /3 and assign armies count
      • If a PLayer holds complete continent Then we will add its continent value to the player army count
      • Now here we have used Max to assign Minimum armies to players of the army count is less than 3 else it gives max armies
      • Once the respective armies has been assigned to that particular player it will set armies to the player based on armycount
      Throws:
      Exception - this Method will throw an Exception if player size is less than 0

    • saveGame

      public void saveGame(String p_FileName)
      This method takes the filename from the user and saves the game as in saves the game model object in to the file
      Parameters:
      p_FileName - name of the file to save the game

    • loadGame

      public static GameModel loadGame(String p_FileName)
      This methods loads the saved game. It takes the name of the saved game file as input and converts it into the game model object and returns this object
      Parameters:
      p_FileName - name of the saved game file
      Returns:
      game object of gamemodel

    • tournamentstartUpPhase

      public void tournamentstartUpPhase()

      This Method is the startup Phase method for TournamentPhase

      • This Method will take all the players in a a list.
      • Then it will check for all the countries available in a map.
      • It will run the loop until all the countries are assigned to players.
      • Now it will Randomly assign countries to all players and remove the assigned countries from the list.
